datalevel

Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • datalevel.DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements connection with Bank. Sends specified requests to server and returns data to model

      • checkPin

        public boolean checkPin(java.lang.String cardID,
                        java.lang.String pin)
                 throws RequestException
        Checks PIN code of credit card
        Parameters:
        cardID - number of credit card
        pin - PIN code, that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if specified PIN code is correct, else returns false
        Throws:
        RequestException - if received incorrect parameters or server is disconnected

      • receiveCash

        public double receiveCash(java.lang.String cardID,
                          java.lang.String pin,
                          double cashSize)
                   throws RequestException
        Checks PIN code and receives specified sum from credit card
        Parameters:
        cardID - number of credit card
        pin - PIN code of credit card
        cashSize - sum that will be received
        Returns:
        balance of credit card after transaction
        Throws:
        RequestException - if received incorrect parameters, not enough money or server is disconnected
